title: Tech Swiss Watch Band Thick Leather Fits Panerai Buckle Brown 22 millimeter
features: 22mm Fits Panerai Watch Band Genuine Leather Brown With White Stitching Strap
Watch Band: Width 22mm and 22mm Buckle Side
Strap is Like Original, Leather Grain, Thick Strap and Non-Tapered Cut or Straight Cut
Heavy Buckle Stainless Steel Finish Buckle Hypoallergenic and Leather Lining
Band Length: 3 3/4" Hole Side and 4 3/4" Buckle Side, including Buckle
description: Tech Swiss is a family owned and operated business that has been serving the watch trade industry for over two generations. For more than 50 years, the company has been one of the leading watch parts and accessories businesses in North America. We continue to expand our product lines while meeting the needs of a changing watch and jewelry industry.

Tech Swiss specializes in a fine line of watch accessories with exceptional quality. Our company offers handcrafted watch winders, watch storage boxes, jewelry boxes, valets, organizers, watch bands and straps. Tech Swiss is one of the leading companies in designing watch winders with quality motors, unique designs, and functionality to meet the needs of the watch consumer. We specialize in a variety of watch boxes and jewelry cases with elegant designs, warm colors, and luxurious textures. Our boxes are well designed with impeccable quality and style that even meets the needs of the most discriminate collector. We also carry a full line of watch bands and straps for all kinds of makes and models of timepieces. We offer a wide variety of watch bands and straps including exotic leather, metal, rubber, silicon, and nylon.

At Tech Swiss, we have made it our mission to provide all customers attentive and friendly service while offering top quality products. Tech Swiss associates are dedicated to provide extraordinary customer service at every level. We strive to exceed your expectation with product knowledge and outstanding assistance. We are also committed to finding new ways to build a better future and stride towards making more ecological choices.

Tech Swiss features Panerai style watch band in brown leather with contrasting white stitching, leather grain, non-tapered or straight cut, heavy thick band, stainless steel matte finish large buckle, like original band, leather lining, men's standard length and 2 spring bars. Watchband is available in men sizes 22mm, 24mm and 26mm. Band Length: 3 3/4-Inch on the buckle side, including the buckle and 4 3/4-Inch on hole side. Thickness: 5mm Tech Swiss offers a full line of premium quality replacement watch bands in calfskin leather, crocodile, alligator, lizard, ostrich, shark and sting-ray. We carry a wide range of straps lengths in including Ladies-standard, Men's-standard, Long, Extra-Long and XX-Long. Tech Swiss only uses the highest quality of materials including superior soft Nubuck and genuine leather linings. Our construction of the bands feature reinforced stitching around the band. We offer many combinations of styles, designs and finishes in buckles that are all Nickel Free. All of our straps include stainless steel spring bars. We are confident you will not find a larger selection of leather watchstraps in colors, sizes and lengths on the market. When ordering a watch band, please refer to the provided images to determine the correct size.
